oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: This Little Light of Mine Program: Black Gospel on Record and Radio
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of one segment of This Little Light of Mine. This Little Light of Mine is a show that provides introspection to the main influencers of African-American gospel. The segment hosted by an unidentified voice. The first segment is called "Sweet Honey in the Rock: New Songs From An Old Tradition." The recordings are from unidentified dates.
